title: ConstructionYard SoundEffect
description: Ambiance package suitable for construction sites, industrial areas, factories, and manufacturing facilities.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/PzW_MZyW2Bc

Ambiance package suitable for construction sites, industrial areas, factories, and manufacturing facilities.

  • 40 Audio, 40 Cue
  • Mono, Stereo Audio Loops


※ Copyright Notice!

This asset package is safe from copyright claims and warnings on YouTube. You are free to use this product as you wish, including for commercial projects, without any issues.

technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.


  • Number of Audio Wavs: 80, < Stereo 40 / Mono 40 >
  • Number of Audio Cue: 80 < Stereo 40 / Mono 40 >
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 25:33
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10 LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12 LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12 LU ~
  • Average Momentary : - 8 LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : -0 dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.
